suppliedEmail.title: Supplied Email

reason.description: The reason why the case was created, such as Instructions not clear, or User didn’t attend training. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
reason.title: Reason Name or ID

status.title: Status Name or ID

isEscalated.description: Whether the case has been escalated (true) or not
isEscalated.title: Is Escalated

suppliedCompany.description: The company name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created..
suppliedCompany.title: Supplied Company

priority.description: The importance or urgency of the case, such as High, Medium, or Low. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority.title: Priority Name or ID

suppliedName.description: The name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.
suppliedName.title: Supplied Name

subject.title: Subject

accountId.title: Account ID

description.description: Contains a text description of the task
description.title: Description

recurrenceInstance.description: The frequency of the recurring task. For example, “2nd” or “3rd.”. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
recurrenceInstance.title: Recurrence Instance Name or ID

recurrenceDayOfWeekMask.description: The day or days of the week on which the task repeats. This field contains a bitmask. The values are as follows: Sunday = 1 Monday = 2 Tuesday = 4 Wednesday = 8 Thursday = 16 Friday = 32 Saturday = 64. Multiple days are represented as the sum of their numerical values. For example, Tuesday and Thursday = 4 + 16 = 20.
recurrenceDayOfWeekMask.title: Recurrence Day Of Week Mask

whatId.description: The WhatId represents nonhuman objects such as accounts, opportunities, campaigns, cases, or custom objects. WhatIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhatId is equivalent to the ID of a related object.
whatId.title: What ID

activityDate.description: Represents the due date of the task. This field has a timestamp that is always set to midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.
activityDate.title: Activity Date

type.description: Represents Type of the task, such as Call or Meeting. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
type.title: Type Name or ID

anyOf.description: The last date on which the task repeats. This field has a timestamp that is always set to midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.
anyOf.title: Recurrence End Date Only

anyOf.description: The date when the recurring task begins. Must be a date and time before RecurrenceEndDateOnly.
anyOf.title: Recurrence Start Date Only

recurrenceType.description: Website for the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
recurrenceType.title: Recurrence Type Name or ID

subject.description: The subject line of the task, such as “Call” or “Send Quote.” Limit: 255 characters. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
subject.title: Subject Name or ID

recurrenceMonthOfYear.description: The month of the year in which the task repeats
recurrenceMonthOfYear.title: Recurrence Month Of Year

recurrenceTimeZoneSidKey.description: The time zone associated with the recurring task. For example, “UTC-8:00” for Pacific Standard Time.
recurrenceTimeZoneSidKey.title: Recurrence TimeZone SidKey

callType.description: The type of call being answered: Inbound, Internal, or Outbound. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
callType.title: Call Type Name or ID

value.description: The value to set on custom field
value.title: Value

fieldId.description: The ID of the field to add custom field to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
fieldId.title: Field Name or ID

callObject.description: Name of a call center. Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.
callObject.title: Call Object

callDisposition.description: Represents the result of a given call, for example, “we'll call back,” or “call unsuccessful.” Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.
callDisposition.title: Call Disposition

reminderDateTime.description: Represents the time when the reminder is scheduled to fire, if IsReminderSet is set to true. If IsReminderSet is set to false, then the user may have deselected the reminder checkbox in the Salesforce user interface, or the reminder has already fired at the time indicated by the value.
reminderDateTime.title: Reminder Date Time

isReminderSet.description: Whether a popup reminder has been set for the task (true) or not (false)
isReminderSet.title: Is ReminderSet

status.description: The current status of the task, such as In Progress or Completed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
status.title: Status Name or ID

recurrenceDayOfMonth.description: The day of the month in which the task repeats
recurrenceDayOfMonth.title: Recurrence Day Of Month

priority.description: Indicates the importance or urgency of a task, such as high or low. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority.title: Priority Name or ID

recurrenceRegeneratedType.description: Represents what triggers a repeating task to repeat. Add this field to a page layout together with the RecurrenceInterval field, which determines the number of days between the triggering date (due date or close date) and the due date of the next repeating task in the series. Label is Repeat This Task.
recurrenceRegeneratedType.title: Recurrence Regenerated Type

whoId.description: The WhoId represents a human such as a lead or a contact. WhoIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhoId is equivalent to a contact’s ID or a lead’s ID.

recordTypeId.title: Record Type Name or ID

suppliedEmail.description: The email address that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.
suppliedEmail.title: Supplied Email

reason.description: The reason why the case was created, such as Instructions not clear, or User didn’t attend training. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
reason.title: Reason Name or ID

status.description: The status of the case, such as “New,” “Closed,” or “Escalated.” This field directly controls the IsClosed flag. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
status.title: Status Name or ID

isEscalated.description: Whether indicates whether the case has been escalated (true) or not
isEscalated.title: Is Escalated

suppliedCompany.description: The company name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created..
suppliedCompany.title: Supplied Company

priority.description: The importance or urgency of the case, such as High, Medium, or Low. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority.title: Priority Name or ID

suppliedName.description: The name that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.
suppliedName.title: Supplied Name

description.description: A text description of the case. Limit: 32 KB.
description.title: Description

subject.description: The subject of the case. Limit: 255 characters.
subject.title: Subject

origin.description: The source of the case, such as Email, Phone, or Web. Label is Case Origin. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
origin.title: Origin Name or ID

ParentId.description: The ID of the parent case in the hierarchy. The label is Parent Case.
ParentId.title: Parent ID

suppliedPhone.description: The phone number that was entered when the case was created. This field can't be updated after the case has been created.
suppliedPhone.title: Supplied Phone

owner.description: The owner of the case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner.title: Owner Name or ID

accountId.description: ID of the account associated with this case
accountId.title: Account ID

description.description: Contains a text description of the task
description.title: Description

recurrenceInstance.description: The frequency of the recurring task. For example, “2nd” or “3rd.”. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
recurrenceInstance.title: Recurrence Instance Name or ID

recurrenceDayOfWeekMask.description: The day or days of the week on which the task repeats. This field contains a bitmask. The values are as follows: Sunday = 1 Monday = 2 Tuesday = 4 Wednesday = 8 Thursday = 16 Friday = 32 Saturday = 64 Multiple days are represented as the sum of their numerical values. For example, Tuesday and Thursday = 4 + 16 = 20.
recurrenceDayOfWeekMask.title: Recurrence Day Of Week Mask

whatId.description: The WhatId represents nonhuman objects such as accounts, opportunities, campaigns, cases, or custom objects. WhatIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhatId is equivalent to the ID of a related object.
whatId.title: What ID

activityDate.description: Represents the due date of the task. This field has a timestamp that is always set to midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.
activityDate.title: Activity Date

type.description: Represents Type of the task, such as Call or Meeting. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
type.title: Type Name or ID

anyOf.description: The last date on which the task repeats. This field has a timestamp that is always set to midnight in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time zone.
anyOf.title: Recurrence End Date Only

anyOf.description: The date when the recurring task begins. Must be a date and time before RecurrenceEndDateOnly.
anyOf.title: Recurrence Start Date Only

recurrenceType.description: Recurrence Type of the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
recurrenceType.title: Recurrence Type Name or ID

subject.description: The subject line of the task, such as “Call” or “Send Quote.” Limit: 255 characters. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
subject.title: Subject Name or ID

recurrenceMonthOfYear.description: The month of the year in which the task repeats
recurrenceMonthOfYear.title: Recurrence Month Of Year

recurrenceTimeZoneSidKey.description: The time zone associated with the recurring task. For example, “UTC-8:00” for Pacific Standard Time.
recurrenceTimeZoneSidKey.title: Recurrence TimeZone SidKey

callType.description: The type of call being answered: Inbound, Internal, or Outbound. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
callType.title: Call Type Name or ID

value.description: The value to set on custom field
value.title: Value

fieldId.description: The ID of the field to add custom field to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
fieldId.title: Field Name or ID

callObject.description: Name of a call center. Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.
callObject.title: Call Object

callDisposition.description: Represents the result of a given call, for example, “we'll call back,” or “call unsuccessful.” Limit is 255 characters. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.
callDisposition.title: Call Disposition

reminderDateTime.description: Represents the time when the reminder is scheduled to fire, if IsReminderSet is set to true. If IsReminderSet is set to false, then the user may have deselected the reminder checkbox in the Salesforce user interface, or the reminder has already fired at the time indicated by the value.
reminderDateTime.title: Reminder Date Time

isReminderSet.description: Whether a popup reminder has been set for the task (true) or not (false)
isReminderSet.title: Is ReminderSet

recurrenceDayOfMonth.description: The day of the month in which the task repeats
recurrenceDayOfMonth.title: Recurrence Day Of Month

priority.description: Indicates the importance or urgency of a task, such as high or low. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority.title: Priority Name or ID

recurrenceRegeneratedType.description: Represents what triggers a repeating task to repeat. Add this field to a page layout together with the RecurrenceInterval field, which determines the number of days between the triggering date (due date or close date) and the due date of the next repeating task in the series. Label is Repeat This Task.
recurrenceRegeneratedType.title: Recurrence Regenerated Type

whoId.description: The WhoId represents a human such as a lead or a contact. WhoIds are polymorphic. Polymorphic means a WhoId is equivalent to a contact’s ID or a lead’s ID.
whoId.title: Who ID

owner.description: ID of the User who owns the record. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner.title: Owner Name or ID

callDurationInSeconds.description: Duration of the call in seconds. Not subject to field-level security, available for any user in an organization with Salesforce CRM Call Center.
callDurationInSeconds.title: Call Duration In Seconds

isPrivate.description: Whether this record is viewable only by the owner and administrators (true) or viewable by all otherwise-allowed users (false)
isPrivate.title: Is Private

owner.description: ID of the User who owns the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner.title: Owner Name or ID

description.description: Text description of the Document. Limit: 255 characters.
description.title: Description

status.description: The current status of the task, such as In Progress or Completed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
status.title: Status Name or ID
